de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel

Class BasePanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Widget
      • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Control
        • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Scrollable
          • org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
            • de.nec.nle.siafu.graphics.controlpanel.BasePanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.eclipse.swt.graphics.Drawable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AgentsPanel, OverlaysPanel, PlacesPanel

    public abstract class BasePanel
extends org.eclipse.swt.widgets.Composite
    An abstract clas for the panels in the simulator's gui. Note that all the extending panels have a combo box to choose elements, and status items to display information on the chosen elements.
    Author:
    Miquel Martin
